name: ToastProvider
description: Provides a context for creating and managing toasts.

globalManager.type: { add: func, emit: func, lastEventId: string, listeners: Array<func>, promise: func, remove: func, subscribe: func, toasts: Array<{ actionProps?: object, animation?: 'ending' | 'starting', data?: any, description?: string, height?: number, id: string, onRemove?: func, onRemoveComplete?: func, priority?: 'high' | 'low', timeout?: number, title: string, type?: string }>, update: func }
globalManager.description: A global manager for toasts to use outside of a React component.

limit.description:
The maximum number of toasts that can be displayed at once.
When the limit is reached, the oldest toast will be removed to make room for the new one.

timeout.description: The default amount of time (in ms) before a toast is auto dismissed.
